DOC.brief_summary: This study is intended to evaluate the effect of olive oil phonophoresis on chronic law back pain in female athletes.
DOC.brief_title: Olive Oil Phonophoresis and Chronic Low Back
DOC.detailed_description: This study will enroll 60 female patients suffering from chronic low back pain. the study will run in single blind mode that only patients will kept unaware of treatment. The duration of treatment is 10 days. patients will be assigned randomly to olive oil or placebo group. every day, they will take phonophoresis on lower back using phonophoresis gel as placebo or olive oil as treatment for 10 day. the questionnaires will be filled in baseline visit and day 10. any side effect of drugs or technique will be recorded
DOC.criteria: Young female athletes suffering from low back pain for more than three months Underlying systematic or visceral disease Specific conditions such as neoplasm and fractures, spondylolisthesis Previous low back surgery Pregnancy
